backend/main.mo: Defines core actor types and logic for users, tasks, avatars, and history plus comparison helpers and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module that returns the existing actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing changes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML shell loading the Vite-built React app with a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Timestamp and build version used to trigger frontend rebuilds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app flow handling identity, profile fetch, error screens, profile setup, and dashboard routing.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary showing a fallback UI with reload option on unhandled errors.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapErr: Error screen for failed profile bootstrap with retry and sign-out actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on actor change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and registering assistants via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a theme hook that manages light, dark, and system theme modes with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark mode with a warm clinic-themed color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Empty page placeholder for the assistant dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with UI feedback states.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the manager dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating a user profile, validating input, and submitting registration through the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleDashboard.tsx: Displays a basic user dashboard with profile details and logout functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps backend error messages to short, user-friendly text for display in UI flows.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature request tracking for fixing profile creation and authorization flows.
